mapper.insert: insert into app_frige_contents_list_tb values((select user_id from mst_user_info_tb where product_id like #{product_id}), list_id.nextval, #{content_nm}, (SELECT content_ty FROM APP_FRIGE_CONTENTS_TB WHERE irdnt_nm LIKE #{content_nm}), SYSDATE, SYSDATE+(SELECT due_date FROM APP_FRIGE_CONTENTS_TB WHERE irdnt_nm LIKE #{content_nm}), 0, 0, 0, 0, #{image_name}, #{image_path})
